display.title: §aUpgrading Our Machines§r
description: EvilCraft machines can be upgraded using &&6Promises&&r. Each Promise will have different effects, but first, we'll want to upgrade our Blood Infuser to unlock more recipes.
To do this, we need to create a &&6Promise of Tenacity: Tier 1&&r. Generally, this just increases the storage capacity of a machine. For the Blood Infuser, this will unlock more recipes!
